Megatron X smirked as she seemed to question him. Good, it meant she was n=
ot a blind fool. He had already formulated a plan. One of the Maximal leade=
rs seemed to be in need of help and his brand of aid was surely enough for =
his needs. it would also allow him to begin pushing for them all to leave. =
After exterminating most of these maximals and Predacons and whatever else =
was making a mess of things.
=A0
"A Lord Elder Has been asking for help. Ga=
ining his favor would allow us access to power and materials to expidite ou=
r exodus from this world. And from here, our horizons broaden."
=A0
He turn=
ed to a computer console and searched the logs for the last transmision fro=
m the Maximal in question.

--- On Tue, 11/3/09, Lady B <MaximaSR74@...=
> wrote:


From: Lady B <MaximaSR74@...>
Subject: Re: A new body
To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, November 3, 2009, 12:21 PM


=A0 



>
=
> 
> Smiling as fruit of his efforts now stood before him. A tall and beuti=
ful thing, a worthy follower and companion. He watched as she tested her we=
aponry, becoming familiar now with his new body. Now they were a force to b=
e reckoned with. 
> =A0
> "We return, but to a precarious world. WHat we do=
 here will last to the future, our pasts. We must preserve this little worl=
d, or everything will be gone. The descendants of the Decepticns and the Au=
tobots quarrel mindlessly, make changes to this world for their own gain. F=
or the Decepticon EMpire to have a future, we must make safe it's past. But=
 we must not be hasty, we should use these fools for all they are worth bef=
ore putting an end to them."
> 
> 

Listening to him as she glanced at her =
weapons, then retracted them. Looking at him with those cold crimson optics=
, her faceplate blank with no expression. 
She was completely back! 

"Hmmm=
... indeed a delimma," she stated in her deep femme voice, pausing but a mo=
ment, "But surely nothing we can't handle," as a wicked smirk crossed those=
 metallic lips. Well beyond into this future which had taken them into thei=
r past, she was an older Decepticon but felt out of place nonetheless. The =
future of her comrades in arms and her beloved Leader lay in her's and Mega=
tron X's hands. 

Nodding one, "Very well. Have you any ideas? Plans?"
Slow=
ly, those memories contained with the nucleus of the spark seeped into her =
new meta-processor. Reformating those memories into what was at what time i=
n her existance. All the way from her creation and Aide to the Defense Corp=
s, coming to know Megatron as he rose to power from a gladiator to leader o=
f a new army... all the way til recently when she had been reformatted into=
 a transorganic, escaped from Cybertron, came here and met up with Hydras a=
nd his faction of Predacons. 
Hydras. 
Those recent memories filtered in. B=
ut the emotion that once supported their fancy for one another... was no lo=
nger there. Indeed she was right, the organic side of her did cause more of=
 a non-cybertron personality within her.. Ever so glad she no longer had to=
 deal with that pathetic form any longer.. 

Her optics remained upon Megat=
ron X. Pleased that she was at least back in the presense of a Decepticon. =
Or so he claimed. 
Now the curiosity welled within her. She wanted to know =
more about this mech who stood before her, who retrieved her and brought he=
r back to the land of moving parts. Ever so grateful for his assistance and=
 dedication. But she had learned long ago... that though one may possess th=
e name of Megatron, does not mean he IS Megatron.
She will have to test him=
.
